projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with modern payment integration and inventory management
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive e-commerce platform built with React and Node.js, featuring real-time inventory management, secure payment processing with Stripe, and an intuitive admin dashboard. Includes features like product filtering, shopping cart persistence, and order tracking.

projects.title: Collaborative Task Manager
projects.description: Real-time task management application with team collaboration features
projects.longDescription: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, team workspaces, and project tracking. Built with Vue.js and Socket.io for instant synchronization across team members. Features include drag-and-drop task organization, time tracking, and progress analytics.
projects.imageAlt: Task manager interface with kanban board

projects.title: Weather Forecast App
projects.description: Mobile-responsive weather application with location-based forecasts
projects.longDescription: A responsive weather application that provides detailed forecasts, weather maps, and location-based alerts. Features include geolocation support, offline caching, and beautiful weather animations. Built as a Progressive Web App for mobile-first experience.
projects.imageAlt: Weather app showing current conditions and forecast

projects.title: Code Optimization Tool
projects.description: Developer tool for analyzing and optimizing JavaScript performance
projects.longDescription: A developer tool that analyzes JavaScript code for performance bottlenecks and suggests optimizations. Features include bundle size analysis, unused code detection, and performance metrics visualization. Helps developers identify and fix performance issues in their applications.
projects.imageAlt: Code optimization tool dashboard with performance metrics

projects.title: Portfolio Generator
projects.description: Static site generator for creating developer portfolios
projects.longDescription: A command-line tool that generates static portfolio websites from configuration files. Features customizable themes, automatic optimization, and deployment integration. Helps developers quickly create professional portfolios without starting from scratch.
projects.imageAlt: Portfolio generator CLI interface and generated site preview
